channel.title: Help me please alot of people are waiting[i have another question plz]
channel.description:
hello i run a server(base: project fatality) in which it's client sucks so I'm switching to hybrid pvp client but the problem with the client is that where i click on the skills tab the client freezes and gives me this error: [code=java]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:9454) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2752) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9325) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10165) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] please help me if you can
edit:
i think i know what's the problem as the nice people below me pointed out that the client doesn't have some interfaces the server wants so my question is how do i add interfaces :D

@own_master wrote:

Owner Zack of PwnageScape:

I think there’s a guide on here about it. What was the problem with the first client anyway?

the problem with it is that the mapdata in it sucks and models and so on

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please alot of people are waiting[i have another question plz]

item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hello i run a server(base: project fatality) in which it’s client sucks so I’m switching to hybrid pvp client but the problem with the client is that where i click on the skills tab the client freezes and gives me this error:

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:9454) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:2752) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9325) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10165) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5752) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
please help me if you can

edit:

i think i know what’s the problem as the nice people below me pointed out that the client doesn’t have some interfaces the server wants so my question is how do i add interfaces
